  • Classes in org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.util used by org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui 
    Class and Description
    PackageToolPopup
    A helper class that creates a popup with a uniform look for the entire application.
  • Classes in org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.util used by org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.util 
    Class and Description
    ControlType
    An enum of types of Control objects that we create in the ControlFactory
    EmptyFieldButtonDisableListener
    Simple listener that keeps track of Strings if any of the fields are empty it disables a button, once all fields have values it reenables the button.
    PackageToolPopup
    A helper class that creates a popup with a uniform look for the entire application.
    ProfilePropertyBox 
    PropertyBox 
    TextPropertyBox
    A text widget with a label and text input control, with possibility of adding validation to the text property The VBox is necessary because validation adds an additional Label element above the HBox temporarily, informing the user of a problem with the entry while it is invalid.
  • Classes in org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.util used by org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view 
    Class and Description
    PackageToolPopup
    A helper class that creates a popup with a uniform look for the entire application.
    ProfilePropertyBox 
    ProgressDialogPopup
    A popup that includes a progress dialog.
    TextPropertyBox
    A text widget with a label and text input control, with possibility of adding validation to the text property The VBox is necessary because validation adds an additional Label element above the HBox temporarily, informing the user of a problem with the entry while it is invalid.
    UserDefinedPropertyBox
    Creates a VBox that contains the controls for defining a user defined property.
